text: Define CI/CD pipeline for repository https://github.com/org/awesomeapp and service auth-service. Specify pipeline stages, triggers, caching, test execution, and deployment strategy for environment staging.
Create CI/CD pipeline YAML example for repository https://github.com/org/awesomeapp and service auth-service.

Create CI/CD pipeline YAML example with stages, triggers, caching, test execution, and deployment strategy for environment staging. Identify pipeline tool (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD). Determine artifact storage (e.g., Nexus, Artifactory) and rollback procedure.

Pipeline stages:
  - build
  - test
  - deploy
Triggers: 
  - push to GitHub repository
Caching: 
  - cache dependencies using Docker
Test execution: 
  - run unit tests and integration tests using Pytest
Deployment strategy: 
  - deploy to staging environment using Kubernetes
Use Nexus as artifact storage. Configure repository and group ID for Maven builds.

pipeline-stages:
  - build
  - test
  - deploy
triggers: 
  - push to GitHub repository
caching: 
  - cache dependencies using Docker
test-execution: 
  - run unit tests and integration tests using Pytest
deployment-strategy: 
  - deploy to staging environment using Kubernetes
